name: Service Center Payment Report - Aggregate
report_script:
columns = [ "Name" + "::120", "Payment Done" + "::100", "Customer" + "::100", "Amount" + "::100" ] query = f'''SELECT * FROM `tabIssueRapl` WHERE service_centre="{filters.service_centre}" AND payment_done="{filters.payment_done}"''' my_data = frappe.db.sql( query, as_dict=True ) ## Message message = f'''Service Centre -

{filters.service_centre}'s

payment status for payments that are - {filters.payment_done}''' ## Final data = columns, my_data, message, None, None
